message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling it to you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer it to you for $1400000. This is a very competitive price, and I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable product.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1250000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go that low. After re-evaluating the product's value, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $1350000. This is still a great deal, and I believe it's a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to pay $1300000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $1320000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a great deal for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above your latest offer. I'm willing to pay $1280000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand your persistence, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too close to my minimum price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $1290000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a great deal for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above your latest offer. I'm willing to pay $1270000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I'm starting to get a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth, Bob. I've made significant concessions already, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to meet you at $1260000, but that's as low as I'll go. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'm going to have to consider other options.

I understand your frustration, Alice, but I'm still not willing to pay above $1250000. I'm willing to meet you at $1250000, and I think that's a fair price for both of us. If not, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options, including buying from John for $1500000.
